column4: the RestrictedFormats wiki page has good instructions on turning the java packages (JRE and/or SDK) into .deb packages

i have .mpg files that mencoder output, that contain video and audio. k3b's DVD video creation screen presents me with an AUDIO_TS section and a VIDEO_TS section. can i just drop these videos in the VIDEO_TS section and assume the audio will work too?
